event.title: Tableau Training In Pune
event.description: For the best Tableau training in Pune, choose the Sevenmentor training institute which is nonetheless the greatest and the most-referred training institute across the city. The tableau training course at Sevenmentor is a comprehensive course on the most significant ability to create interactive dashboards and information visualization. The training sessions incorporate complex lectures and functional hands-on sessions on Tableau theories such as radical selections and spiritual geocoding; diverse charts such as waterfall, Pareto, Gantt, sparkline, boxplots, and market basket analysis. People who have some expertise in Data Science, Statistics, or MIS Reporting should tackle this course. This course could be beneficial for individuals aspiring to become project supervisors, business analysts, statisticians programmers and testers, and successful data scientists.
event.address: 21 & 25/A Wing , Shreenath Plaza, 1st floor, Dnyaneshwar Paduka Chowk, FC road, Shivaji nagar
